taxa: [...] the shrews (Soricidae), the molesand desmans (Talpidae), the hedgehogs and gymnures(Erinaceidae), the tenrecs (Tenrecidae), the goldenmoles (Chrysochloridae) and the enigmatic solenodons(Solenodontidae)

results.notes: ESC is common for Chiropterans and antelopes (Cotteril, 2001a,b, 2002a, 2003,a-c)
